-L-cQdbBqhOky5u6Ms_V.text: Congratulations! You have been chosen to receive Loloi Javari JV-08 Area Rug for RugStudio  in exchange for a creative post about the product. We'll ship the product soon. Please remember to follow the guidelines of the product post and respond here with any questions!

-L-cS3KyIfpBwIiY8SOD.text: What size were you interested in? We can sell it to you at a very deep discount, or ship you one for free though we would need it returned, or dropped off at our Austin store. Let me know, thanks!

-L-d-YcOXu-TgIQdZ0aR.text: Thanks for accepting me üòÅ. I don't think the rental option would work well for me, as it's a bit of hassle and my days are pretty busy. Would you mind explaining the discount? Thanks

-L-d4PE4fj1WVcT4MS3U.text:
You're welcome, thank you for applying! 

We completely understand about returning the rug. For the discount option it would depend on the size you want. Take the 8x10 (7'10''x10') for example; we sell that for $899 on the site. The discount we can offer for that size would be about 50% and would bring the final price to $425.

-L-dMlAIedyPkt3yF9xa.text: Ohh I see. I think that's a bit too expensive for me right now, but I appreciate it! Beautiful rug üòÅ

-L02iNC3I_rm4a6WWyR5.text: Hello, thanks so much for applying to the Black Flat Crossbody  partnership. Unfortunately, we are looking for an account more tailored to our type of product. Stay updated on Verb as we would love to work with you in the future on a campaign better suited for your feed.

-MrSqpsWcEE47GLCqa9J.text: Your content was rejected for GermanSky: Video Content: Drones Start War, we are on their side. Please review feedback and make any necessary updates to your content.

-LtphoGwe52fJAwlk36l.text: Congratulations! You have been chosen to receive Leaf Shave - Sustainable Razor for The Social Savannah We're excited to work with you and can't wait to see what you create. Please remember to follow the project guidelines and reach out with any questions.

-LtpjSe2bXXzP9bd6G5F.text: Hi Melena! So excited to be working together. I'll be shipping out the razor ASAP. So excited to see your videos! Please let me know if you have any questions! As per the campaign guidelines please be respectful of the due date.

-Lx2j1kxzqfT_n-3WufA.text: Yes we will! We have content for both campaigns ready (photos and video) and will be posting both posts this weekend. We just needed to post the holiday related content first. Hope that‚Äôs understandable. üòä

-LxVrBFV4dP5rHbFKM2D.text: Hi darling! We hope you loved the posts! We wanted to wish you a super successful new year filled with love and positivity. ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you so much for this wonderful collaboration!
